sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import { Playground } from 'docz'
import * as PIXI from 'pixi.js'
import Stage from '../stage'
import { Mesh } from '../index'
import { uvs, vertices, indices } from './MeshDocz'

export default ({components, ...props}) => <MDXTag name="wrapper"  components={components}>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"mesh"}}>{`Mesh`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"props"}}>{`Props`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"http://pixijs.download/dev/docs/PIXI.mesh.Mesh.html"}}>{`http://pixijs.download/dev/docs/PIXI.mesh.Mesh.html`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"usage"}}>{`Usage`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={0} __code={`<Stage width={500} height={300} options={{ backgroundColor: 0xeef1f5 }}>
  <Mesh
    image="https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/s.cdpn.io/693612/placeholder.png"
    uvs={uvs}
    vertices={vertices}
    indices={indices}
    drawMode={PIXI.mesh.Mesh.DRAW_MODES.TRIANGLES}
  />
</Stage>`} __scope={{props,PIXI,Stage,Mesh,uvs,vertices,indices}}>
  <Stage width={500} height={300} options={{ backgroundColor: 0xeef1f5}}>
    <Mesh image="https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/s.cdpn.io/693612/placeholder.png" 
          uvs={uvs}
          vertices={vertices} 
          indices={indices} 
          drawMode={PIXI.mesh.Mesh.DRAW_MODES.TRIANGLES} />
  </Stage>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"example"}}>{`Example`}</MDXTag>
<iframe 
  height={500} 
  scrolling="no"
  title="Container" 
  src="//codepen.io/inlet/embed/69e7153234c4e01232a7dbc50bbceb40/?height=300&theme-id=33987&default-tab=result&embed-version=2"
  frameBorder="no" 
  allowransparency="true"
  allowFullScreen="true"
  style={{ width: '100%' }} /></MDXTag>
